alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:33PM CDT until June 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NESS...RUSH AND SOUTHEASTERN ELLIS COUNTIES... At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bazine, moving east at 20 mph. A second severe thunderstorm was located near Loretta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. Golfball size hail was reported 3 miles southeast of Bazine at 730 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Alexander, McCracken, Nekoma, La Crosse, Rush Center and Hargrave. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
